long_description: Redesigned for a larger capacity, the rugged Metolius Ropemaster(TM) HC rope bag protects your climbing rope from the damaging effects of dirt, sun and moisture. Features a large 58 x 52 in. tarp with an easy-load pocket that controls the rope while packing it up; pocket is sized to hold up to a 70m rope. To stow your rope, simply flake it onto the tarp, stuff it into the easy-load pocket, fold the sides of the tarp in, roll it up and stuff it into the bag. Tarp also functions as a handy groundsheet for booting up or stretching before a climb. Durable plastic window lets you see into the bag and identify which rope is stowed. Built-in compression straps with sturdy aluminum buckles let you cinch the load down. Ropemaster HC rope bag has a volume of 1,960 cu. in. (32 liters). The Metolius Ropemaster HC rope bag has a padded carry strap for easy transportation.
